title: A Sleepless Night, An Oath at Dawn

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ――Like Menkalinan in the Auriga constellation.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Standing close, but not too close.
When I tried to push you away, you came back around to me, as if drawn by gravity... You stayed by my side, even now.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
You're equally kind to everyone. You lend your help to others without a second thought. You want to meet their expectations.
――Always putting others first.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You should think of yourself a little more...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
...A role that fits me... one on equal footing with the sun...
But I...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
By the way, I've decided to play the role of the Sun King!
For I am like the sun, blessing everyone with warmth!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: By the same token, I want you to think of a kingdom befitting yourself, and about what sort of light you bring to our generation.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Bring to life a kingdom all your own!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Do I really have a light like that...? But Opera O-chan wouldn't say something like that for no good reason... Hmm.....

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ......Hey. Are you all right?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Ayabe-san!!
Um, Ayabe-san, what kind of Umamusume do you think I am!?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
!? 
...Um... maybe... You're a sociable class president. You're always thinking about what you can do for others.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You'd be better off thinking about yourself a little harder.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: ! You're right... It could be I need more self-reflection. I didn't figure it out until Opera O-chan asked about it.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...What? No, hang on――

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much, Ayabe-san! That was great advice! I'll do my best to really think about who I am.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text:
Ah...
...That's not what I meant...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: (...I need to choose my words better. I went and assumed Top Road-san would understand what I meant...)

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Why, hello, Ayabe-san. Do you have a moment?
I'd like to ask you to come with me.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Unfortunately, I'm busy.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Don't be that way, O Wayward Werther.
I won't let the script give us an unfitting ending!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Well? Why did you take me all the way up here?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Take a look down there.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
My deepest, deepest apologies for calling you here!
So, every role except for Top Road-san's has been decided.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: This may be out of turn, but I thought we could give you a rundown of the backstory! I... I think it might help you figure out your role.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: A rundown of the backstory...?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Uhm, I asked Digital-san to do it!
I- I- I thought it might help you out...!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I know I'm being presumptuous, but...
But, but, you're always helping me out, Top Road-san, so...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
All this for me...? Thank you so much!
To be honest, I'm kind of stuck on this, so... Let me hear the summary!

text_block_list.name: Digital and Doto
text_block_list.text: R- right!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Just so you know, I didn't say a word to them about this. They moved on their own accord, for the sake of Top Road-san.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
For our generation to be Number One, we need her.
Wheels on their own cannot move. An axle must be there to connect them.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ...She is like our axle. Although she doesn't seem to know it.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...I understand what you're saying, more or less. She doesn't value herself enough. So? What are you going to do about it?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: ――I'll simply wait.

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: You'll wait...? You're not going to help her?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Of course. After all, she doesn't need my help.
No matter what hardships befall her――

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: She will never betray my expectations.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: And, I might add, the one who pays the closest attention to her is none other than you.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Of all those who are moved to support her...
You would be the first.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Am I wrong?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
If I remember correctly, Opera O-chan was the Sun King.
What about Ayabe-san and Doto-chan?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ayabe-san's the Ice King, just like before. Her ice-cold demeanor that melts in the warmth of kindness... It's just so Ayabe-san.

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: Oh, that kind of makes sense...!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Doto-san is the the King of Darkness, the counterpart to the Sun King. She looks up to the sun's light, but that admiration turns to obsession, and her shadow grows ever darker...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: On the surface, it looks like she hates the Sun King, but really, her yearning is so strong, it's turned into jealousy. The angsty feels here are key!

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Whoa...! It sounds amazing when you explain it like that!
But... it doesn't really gel with how I usually think of Doto-chan...?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Uhm... The role sounds a little scary, but... there are parts that are like me. I look up to Opera O-san. But she can shine too bright for me...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I talk down to myself, and get depressed a lot, but I can't bring myself to give up... My messy feelings are a bit like the, uhm..."angsty feels"? I think...

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I see...
...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: So... Do you think this helped a little bit?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text:
Of course it did!
I'll do my best to come up with a fitting role. Do you think you can wait just a little longer?

text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road
text_block_list.text: (...Doto-chan really understood who she was, and the role she'll play. I have to give this more thought...!)

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Top Road-san. Do you... have a minute?
